Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! The US expresses a sense of mystery, suspicion and seclusion towards local community for anonymity, while the Dutch express a sense of togetherness, contentment and acceptance of anonymity. This underlying conflict is reflected in how privacy is perceived in both societies.

This comparison of opinions reveals a point.
